title: Depths of Betrayal CE v1.0.0 (Full)
description:
Stop a mechanical monster before it destroys an entire town in Depths of Betrayal! Uncover the truth and stop the terrifying machine in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. 

Protect the people of the town and figure out why the machine turned its back on its creator and went berserk. Search amazing locations and find important clues to solve the mystery and save the town in Depths of Betrayal!

Features:

- Mesmerizing graphics enhance the story
- Majestic backdrops in each scene
- Travel by train and even escape a jail!
